ygData.subject: Oak Bark discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: just went to everlore and found out that....
ygData.messageBody:
just went to everlore and found out that....
> Mithril Leathers of the Fier`Dal
> In Order to tailor Fier`dal armor one must first acquire Mithril
> Bits, a needle mold, a thimble mold and a flask of water and smith a
> Fier`dal Sewing Kit. One just also acquire Oak Bark Tannin, brewed from a
> Flask of Water and Oak Bark.
>
> the location of this is probably random, but I found mine in ButcherBlock
> at
> /loc +260.93 +2316.76
>
>
>
> Ok.. So which one of these is the Southeast camp?
> Camp 1, 2, or 3?
> I never got killed by Qued, but I did kick his arse plenty of times.
> Next time I see him I'll kick it again, just for you. :-)
> I got irritated bc PegLeg and his group conned green to me yet they
> managed
> to kill me.
> I think they were waaay underconning.
> I got even though. Now I just have to get even with Embassador Dvinn...
> luv,
> -Su
>
